lifeFrame.Wiki: How long the sound will be heard

bSpEffectEnable.Wiki: Determines whether or not speffects can affect this sound

opposeTarget.Wiki: Will your enemies hear this sound?

friendlyTarget.Wiki: Will your allies hear this sound?

bRestrictSamePlacementGroup.Wiki: Sound will only be heard by enemies within the same PlacementGroup

bCallFriend.Wiki: Is it a sound to call friends? Occurs only when you have an enemy target

Self.Wiki: Defines sounds that enemies can hear
